title: Ticket #5778: Remove options for "eager" generation of sub-DAG .condor.sub files
description:
We should remove the option to "eagerly" generate sub-DAG .condor.sub files (-do_recurse on the condor_submit_dag command line or setting DAGMAN_GENERATE_SUBDAG_SUBMITS to true in config).

This is extra complication in the code, and priorities on sub-DAGs won't work right...
